thread.title: Enter for a chance to win tickets to Bernadette Peters at NJPAC
thread.title_full: Enter for a chance to win tickets to Bernadette Peters at NJPAC | NJ.com

author: Bobby Olivier | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Enter for a chance to win tickets to Bernadette Peters at NJPAC
text:
NEWARK â€” After five decades in show business, Bernadette Peters is still performing, and this weekend will sing a medley of hits from her Broadway and music careers in Newark. And here's your chance to snag a pair of tickets to the Oct. 16 show at New Jersey Performing Arts Center in Newark.
Visit our entertainment Facebook page for details, or the NJ.com contest page and fill out the form to enter for a chance to win a pair of tickets to Peters' show. Only one entry per person/per email address. Three winners will be drawn Oct. 14 at approximately 10 a.m. and notified via phone call immediately afterward.
Tickets must be picked up at will call the night of the show.
This promotion is in no way sponsored, endorsed or administered by, or associated with, Facebook.
Bobby Olivier may be reached at bolivier@njadvancemedia.com. Follow him on Twitter @BobbyOlivier . Find NJ.com on Facebook .
